channel.title: Projects on talesrt - Character Artist
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on talesrt - Character Artist

item.title: Black Hand
item.description: Done this piece primarily based on Wei Wang’s outstanding art (https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rerVO) And then followed more references, mixing game and other areas to that character.

item.title: Demonho
item.description: A personal demon character exploration focusing on organic sculpting and dramatic lighting.

item.title: Glutton
item.description: Model inspired by the outstanding work of Bjorn Hurri (https://www.artstation.com/bjornhurri). It was sculpted in ZBrush with retopology and UV in Blender (with RetopoFlow), bake in Marmoset.

item.title: Grave Digger
item.description: Piece done for the Magic: The Gathering Challenge. Unfortunately I wasn’t able to finish it on time. This sculpture was based on the classic “Grave Digger” done by Dermot Power (https://dermotpower.com).

item.title: Redrum
item.description: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy

item.title: The Isofarian Guard
item.description: Set of 50mm miniatures developed for The Isofarian Guard, the new game from Skykingdom Games! Worked shoulder to shoulder by side with my bro Saulo Bonatto in the double character miniatures.

item.title: The Pilot
item.description: Sculpted this piece inspired by Betty Jiang Pilot outstanding artwork. Cheers!

item.title: Wild Flame
item.description:
Had a lot of work and enjoyment doing this game ready character based on the art by Hui Zou (https://www.artstation.com/artwork/rRz6am)

Done during Andre Castro’s advanced class I’m taking, so huge thanks to Andre for the knowledge shared!
